subject: Football (College)
Nuns
lead_paragraph: Sister Lisa Maurer coaches kickers and punters at the College of St. Scholastica in Duluth, Minn., which is 10-0 entering the N.C.A.A. Division III playoffs.
snippet: Sister Lisa Maurer coaches kickers and punters at the College of St. Scholastica in Duluth, Minn., which is 10-0 entering the N.C.A.A. Division III playoffs.
